installCommand: if [ -f package.json ]; then npm install; else cd "figma-drop/Command Center Execution Plan" && npm install; fi
buildCommand: if [ -f package.json ] && [ -d src ]; then npm run build; else cd "figma-drop/Command Center Execution Plan" && npm run build && cd ../.. && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp -R "figma-drop/Command Center Execution Plan/dist/." dist/; fi
